name: Spelunky: Twineslation
description:
Spelunky Twineslation is an attempt to transform one of my favorite games of all time, Spelunky HD, into a Twine format. Some complexity is lost in the translation, but the key ideas have been kept intact. The level structure, randomized “Level Feelings” which add specific events, several of the classic items, and the secret progression route through the game. Enter the caves, see what score you can get!

This game was created in 48 hours as an assignment in translating movement and action into a Twine format.
